TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_a_laylay_nu_Amilika, title = a_laylay_nu_Amilika, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/a_laylay_nu_Amilika} }

S.FORM: a laylay nu Amilika sumamaday nu Amilika . silaad tu ayday a mihcaan tu tulu a mang lima (35000) a malebut a mihcaan, micapi tu ayda a kasisuledaan nu katalakawan nu mihcaan, mahamin nu kitakitay a yadahay nu nanum a ahebalay masaluimeng i Talu sulesuledaan, ahebal han makaala tu cacay a malebut lima a lasubu (1500) a kun li nu kayakay tu dadan mitulin tu Asia atu amisay a Amilikaan . . . cacay a mang idaw ku tusaay a malebut, tademaw han idawtu ku mueneng i satipan nu pangkiw a kitakit (tipay a pangkiw . misatadasay a Amilikaan a tademaw namakayda i Ya cuo (Asia lakuyden nuheni ku kayakay , makatukuh tu mahidaay tu Alaska (A la se cia ), paluma sa cacayay tu a malebut ku eneng. . , . kilul sa pasayda i nutimulan nu aydaay a Amilika . paluma'sa i nutipan amisa Taypin yung a dadipasan, nutipan nutimulan a buyu aut likelikenan atu teban nutipan a Mississippi (Mi si si pi sauwac ) nu dadipasan. (Hohokam), (Adenans), (Hopewellians) (Anasazi) sumamadany a niyadu'ay a binacadan u Ho Ho Ka Mu (Hohokam, ), A Tai Nan Se ( , Adenans), Hupiwi lianse ( , Hopewellians) atu Ana saci ( , Anasazi). , . . patideng kunuheni tu niyadu' paluma tu cacanan a papalumaan, idaw ku patidengay tu sadicum masangkakuay a luma', ayam atu bau a waywayan nu nisangan tu lala' kalihalayan nuheni a kakilulan tu sasinzaan caay kaw kakaliwhan. . u lalangawan nuheni u nakamuwan ku kakilulan, nuka idaw ku duma a binacadan u sulit ku sulitan, kiluken nuheni ku sulit amisinga. capi nu mihcaan a likisi (Hopi) (Zuni). , . numi satadasay a tademaw mikilul tu demiad haymaw sa amalawpes, katinenganay nu aydaay a Amilikaan yincumin kumikutaya, idaw ku Hopi a binacadan (Ho Pi ) atu Zuni a binacada (Cu Ni ). makatukuh satu ku Europe (O cuo ) a tademaw itini i Amilika sa, idaw tu ku tusa a bataan (200) a mang nu tademawan, hakiya nu yadah a yuncumin muenengay i Amilika . . 985 (Erikthe Red) . misatadasay makatukuhay i pea mea a Europe (O cuo ) a tademaw u Pea o Europe a tademaw, nu aydaay a siwmea a nakamuan. makayda kunuheni i Greenland (Ke lin lan ) pasayda i nutipan amuculil, kya makaala tu siwa a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku lima (C.E. 985 a mihcaan, sumanahay a bukes ci Ayzuyke' (Erikthe Red itida i Greenland (Ke lin lan ) patideng tu lalaliwmaahn. (Leif) 1001 . (L'Anse aux Meadows) . saan ku katuuday, wawa nida ci Lie Bu ( , Leif) itini i siyun cacay a malebut idaw ku cacay (C.E. 1001 a mahcaan mitahaw tunu aydaay a Canada (Cia na ta ) a wali amisan. tawyaay a Pei o a luma' tu maliwanay itida tu i Newfoundland (Niyu fung lan ) amisan a L'Anse aux Meadows (Lan say aw ce , ) kaadihan. 500 100 . . micapitu limaay a mihcaan sa, idaw satu ku Europe (O cuo ) a tademaw makatukuh i Amilikaan (Pia man ), milakuuyd tu cacay a lasubu (100) a mihcaan, kya idaw satu ku matenesay nu liyumahan a tahekal. numitadasay a mitahaway a tademaw, mikilimay tu saka tayda i Asia (Ya cuo ) nu kakaydaan nu balunga. (Genoa) (Christopher Columbus). (Isabella) . sasinganganay nu mitahaway a tademaw namakayda i Genoa (Ze Nuo Ya ) a Kelun pu (Christopher Columbus ) uculil nida namakayda i Spain ni wan ci Isa paila (Isabella ku mipadangay tu saculil nida. 1492 . cacay a malebut sepat a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku tusa (1492) a mihcaan, Columbus (Ke lun pu ) itida i Cia le pi bayu a subalan makatukuh, caay kaw katineang alaw mala Amilika a baluhay. 1500 . cacay a malebut lima a lasubu (1500) a mihcaan u Sipan ya (Spain itida i Amilikan mitahaw a kalimulakan. (Juan Ponce de Le칩n) 1513 1539 (Hernando de Soto) 1540 (Francisco V치zquezde Coronado) 1522 . ci Huang Pens Le aw ( , Juan Ponce de Le칩n) i cacay a malebut lima a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku tulu (1513) a mihcaan nu aydaay a Florida (Fou luo li ta cuo ) makatukuh, cacay a milbut lima a lasubu tulu a bataan siwa (1539) a mihcaan, ci Henadu.sutuo ( , Hernando de Soto) sayaway makatukuh i Florida (Fuo luo li ta ), micumud aca tayda i Misisi pi a sauwac mitahaw, cacay a malebut lima a lasubu sepat a bataan (1540) a mihcaan, ci Falansise.Keluonatu ( Francisco V치zquezde Coronado) namaka cacay a malebtu lima a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku tusa (1522) a mihcaa mahiya madebung nu Si pan ya ku Mexico (Muo si ke ) pasaydan i amis muculil. (Seven Cities of Cibola) (Grand Canyon) (Great Plains). mangalay mikilim tu nakamuwan nu babalaki a Sipuo laci tukay ( (Seven Cities of Cibola), amica kunikacaay ka tepa', naculilan mamin ku Yalisan na a cascasan ( Grand Canyon) atu " Tay pinyun a enal" ( , Great Plains). (Giovanni da Verrazano), (Jacques Cartier) (Amerigo Vespucci). namaka Sipan ya (Spain a tademaw pasayda i amis micumud sa, aydaay a Amilika nu amisan a kitidaan hamaw han nu O cuo (Europe mitahaway a tademaw amicumud, nina mitahaway a tademaw pasu ci ( , Giovanni da Verrazano), ci Ciakua. kati ay ( Jacques Cartier) atu mala Mei cuo talu kasinganganan a Yamei like. wisepu ci ( (Amerigo Vespucci). 1500 . Amilika misatadasy u O cuo (Europe a tademaw ku patidengay tu sakatenesay nu ka kaykunngan sa i cacay a malebut lima a lasubu (1500) a mihcaan nu teban, u Sipan ya (Spain a tademaw itda i Fuoluo lita a (augustine (Senaw kuse tin ) patideng. . sa, nina kabulawan a kitidaan itini i Amilika nu baluhay a kanatal anikaydaan apatideng sa, nai' ku hahicahicaan a kawaw. , , 10 . tadengaay numikawaway han nui amisay nu Tasi yung dadipasan nanay a sakabulawan a kitidaan, mahida ci Virginia (Wi ci ni ya ), Massachusetts (Ma sa cu say ), New York atu duma nu cacay a bataan a kitidaan, itida hantu yadah yadah ku nakaka O cuo (Europe ay a mabulaway nu tademaw. 17 , , , . , , . sabaw tu pitu (17) a seci mahka tayniay i Peime ingkuo kabulawan a kitidaan u Ing kuo (United Kingdom a tademaw ku yadahay, duma hantu namaka He lan(Netherlands , Zuy tin (Sweden ,De kuo (Germany , Fa kuo (France , maudang idaw ku namaka Suke lan atu Pei ayel lan (Ireland a mabulaway. idaw kumiliyasay tu luma' han umilaliway tuni kalepacawan, zhengzhi yapo, midis tu kiwkay atu mipatay. 13 . 3 . mabulaway tayni i Amilika yadah ku hahinian sa, sadikuday satu kunuheni patideng tu sabaw tu tulu (13) nu caaya kalecad a kabulawan nu kitidaan. nina picidekayn itini i tuluay a kitidaan ku kakatinengan. COLONIAL PERIOD8 . kabulawan sa a zitay COLONIAL PERIOD8, mitadasay a mabulaway a tademaw han patideng i lilis dadipasan a Tasi yung atu pasaydaay i bayuay a sawacan nu lilililisan. , , , . wali amis idaw ku kilang mitahap tu buyu, ulala hantu nanu kasisuledaan a zitay nika lasuan nu kuli tu liwan a ba'tu, nanuman saka lihalaysan amicukamas, Sining kelan England a kitidaan nu Masa cuse' , Kannay di ke' atu Luode subal , mapalekal tu nisanga'an tu kilanga,babutingan,misangan tu balunga atu sasiwbayan tu sakaudip. . tebanay a kabulawan nu kitidaan mapulung tu Niw ye (New York atu Pinsi funi ya . . nu mabulaway atu yincumin nikalecabayan, u nikapapadang atu nika cinlaw ka talawan anika pulungan. amica kuyu nikasasiwbayan atu nikalecabayan, anu saahebal satu kumabulaway a tademaw, idaw ku malakalungay a tademaw mangalay misalihalay sa laliw satu.
